avdta.network.link

Class SharedTransitCTMLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.link.Link
      • avdta.network.link.CTMLink
        • avdta.network.link.SharedTransitCTMLink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Link>

    public class SharedTransitCTMLink
extends CTMLink
    This is a CTMLink with a dynamic transit lane, which adds lanes to cells when transit is not present.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • SharedTransitCTMLink

        public SharedTransitCTMLink(int id,
                            Node source,
                            Node dest,
                            double capacity,
                            double ffspd,
                            double wavespd,
                            double jamd,
                            double length,
                            int numLanes,
                            TransitLane transitLane)
        Constructs the link with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        id - the link id
        source - the source node
        dest - the destination node
        capacity - the capacity per lane (veh/hr)
        ffspd - the free flow speed (mi/hr)
        wavespd - the congested wave speed (mi/hr)
        jamd - the jam density (veh/mi)
        length - the length (mi)
        numLanes - the number of lanes (not including the transit lane)
        transitLane - the transit lane

        public int getType()
        Returns the type code for this link
        Overrides:
        getType in class CTMLink
        Returns:
        ReadNetwork.CTM+ReadNetwork.SHARED_TRANSIT

      • tieCells

        public void tieCells()
        Links cells on the main link with cells on the transit lane. The transit lane shares a lane with the main link when transit is not present.

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Prepare to calculate transition flows and move vehicles. This also updates the number of lanes available to each cell.
        Overrides:
        prepare in class CTMLink

      • createLinkRecord

        public LinkRecord createLinkRecord()
        Creates a LinkRecord for manipulating data and writing it to the data file. This is identical to Link.createLinkRecord() except the number of lanes is incremented by 1.
        Overrides:
        createLinkRecord in class Link
        Returns:
        a LinkRecord version of this link's data
